column6: How did Nick Fury become Nick Fury? How did the Hulk become the Hulk? And, finally, how did a baby Peter Parker connect to it all? Plus: the Ultimate Watcher has appeared and he is here to witness the Ultimatum!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller:Gabriele Dell'Otto | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Dean White | inker:Butch Guice | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
